vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σάρεπτα, -ων (Ob 20), τά (Heb. צָרְפַת),
Sarepta, a city of Sidon: Luk.4:26.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Zarephath, [possibly] "smelting place; place of pigmenting, staining"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
§ Zarephath, [possibly] "smelting place; place of pigmenting, staining"
Sarepta, a city of Phoenicia, between Tyre and Sidon, Lk. 4:26*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒勒法 这个專有名詞 地名在希伯來文的意思是 "精煉"
撒勒法的希臘名, 在推羅與西頓之間但比較靠近西頓的
一個腓尼基城鎮。(路 4:26)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒勒法 这个专有名词 地名在希伯来文的意思是 "精炼"
撒勒法的希腊名, 在推罗与西顿之间但比较靠近西顿的
一个腓尼基城镇。(路 4:26)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Sa-rép-ta « lò lửa tan chảy » Xem H6886
